alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued March 08 at 7:04PM MST until March 09 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one half mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Kimball County. In Wyoming, South Laramie Range Foothills, Central Laramie County and East Laramie County. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
